Scan the QR code with the derived key to activate child mode
Enter the parent PIN to access Safety and Settings
Use your fingerprint or face to unlock the wallet
Biometric authentication is not available on this device
Too many failed attempts. Try again later
Створіть зашифровану резервну копію вашого гаманця, щоб захистити себе від втрати або збою пристрою. Необхідно для відновлення гаманця.
Відновіть ваш гаманець з раніше створеного файлу резервної копії. Корисно при налаштуванні на новому пристрої або при відновленні після проблем.
Важливі рекомендації з безпеки та найкращі практики для безпечного використання вашого гаманця Dogecoin. Прочитайте перед зберіганням значних сум.
Технічна документація про архітектуру гаманця, функції та деталі реалізації для досвідчених користувачів.
Report bugs or issues with the wallet
App version, license, and developer information
Enter original text or file hash:
Are you sure you want to delete this recurring payment?
No private key available for signing
The payee (%1$s) is using an incompatible payment protocol (reason: %2$s).
To protect your privacy, your address will change once it receives a payment.
Your name or your company\'s name, to be added to payment requests you issue to your customers.
There is no web browser installed to open the external document.
The amount of tiny payments in your wallet doesn\'t add up to a sendable value.
Remember your balance of %s will be lost if you uninstall the Dogecoin Wallet app without sending it away first.
Hint: to increase the safety of your wallet, you can <u>encrypt your device</u>. This also protects data of other apps.
Please enter a valid IP address or hostname. If you have Tor set up, you can use an onion address here, too.
Guava, a collection of useful helpers
Tip: This wallet works best if you don’t use it for lots of tiny transactions. Too many small inputs can slow things down and make your coins take longer to show up.
This payment was delayed because the sender used an insecure transaction type.
View current exchange rates for Dogecoin
This amount is quite high for carrying in your pocket. Please move some to a safer place.
After a couple of weeks of not being used, the app will notify if there are still coins in the wallet.
Low data usage: Use network filtering to read only transactions relevant to your wallet. It will use about 500 MB per month, but will disclose the filter to the network.
You received %1$s to unsecure addresses. Would you like to move these coins to secure addresses? A small network fee of %2$s will be paid.
A priority fee of %s will be paid. If you care about low fees, use \'priority\' only if you need confirmation as soon as possible.
External block explorer to use for browsing transactions, addresses and blocks.
This payment has an increased risk of being reversed by the sender! If you can, wait for confirmation.

Your device\'s Bluetooth component is vulnerable. Your Dogecoins on this device are at risk, regardless of the app you\'re using to store them!\n\nWe suggest to switch off Bluetooth immediately and check with your device manufacturer for an Android OS update that implements security patch level \'%s\' or later.
Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you remember the PIN in addition to the backup password!
If you don\'t care about your coins, you could also donate them to the Dogecoin Wallet project.
The amount is too small to send.
You\'ve got a bad connection to the Electrum network.
This payment pays to many wallets besides yours, which makes the app slow down over time. If you can, try receiving payments which pay only to you.

Improved privacy: Will not disclose any information about your wallet to the network. Be aware that because all transactions are read, this will use a hefty 10 GB per month. Before using this please check your data allowance.
A network fee of %s will be paid.
In order to scan QR codes, you need to grant permission to use the camera.
You can specify multiple trusted peers by separating them with a space character.
Please back up your wallet\nbefore receiving any Dogecoins!
When the payment is made, the send dialog will close automatically.
Your payment was successful. It has reached the payee.
